sentences.en: And this paper makes good use of modem technology to substantiate the idea.

sentences.en: Despite this, more research is needed to substantiate this association.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此, 这种联系还有赖更多研究来佐证.

sentences.en: Do you have any proof to substantiate your alibi?
sentences.cn: 你有证据表明你当时不在犯罪现场 吗 ?

sentences.en: Draw upon readings and films from throughout the course to substantiate your point of view.
sentences.cn: 请从整门课程中所有的阅读教材及影片中举例以佐证你的观点.

sentences.en: Field experience did not usually substantiate the claims.
sentences.cn: 实际经验通常都不能使这些看法具体化.

sentences.en: However, author offers no evidence to substantiate this assumption.

sentences.en: More data is needed to substantiate the effectiveness of adsorption on sludge as a removal process.
sentences.cn: 需要更多的资料来论证污泥吸附作为去除方法的效能.

sentences.en: Perhaps you will allow us the opportunity to substantiate the viability of our service.
sentences.cn: 或许你们能允许我们继续实现这些服务.

sentences.en: Studies substantiate that IMT correlates consanguineously with the presence of coronary atherosclerosis.
sentences.cn: 大量研究证实颈动脉内膜-中膜厚度与冠状动脉粥样硬化的出现密切相关.

sentences.en: The president's trip will substantiate good relations with the former enemy country.
sentences.cn: 总统的这次访问将会巩固与从前的敌对国之间的良好关系.

sentences.en: There is little scientific evidence to substantiate the claims.
